TestPublisher.CancelSubscription, TestPublisher.RequestMore, TestPublisher.Subscribe, TestSubscriber.OnComplete$, TestSubscriber.OnError, TestSubscriber.OnNext, TestSubscriber.OnSubscribe, TimerMessages.Scheduled
    public interface DeadLetterSuppression
    Use with caution: Messages extending this trait will not be logged by the default dead-letters listener. Instead they will be wrapped as SuppressedDeadLetter and may be subscribed for explicitly.
